name: nasa_pictures
description: Simple NodeJs script of shortcut commands for this code

scripts.generate: yarn run pub:update && dart run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs;
scripts.generate:new: yarn run pub:update && dart run build_runner build;
scripts.generate:serializable: cat cache/x.json | dart run scripts/serializable.dart > cache/class.dart

author: smushaheed@gmail.com
